detail_desc: T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Large metal earrings.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with a small stem on top and a ribbed hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neckline and small opening and button at the back of the neck. Embroidered flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.
Fully lined, bralette-style cropped top in sturdy jersey with a V-neck and wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The polyester content of the top’s lining is recycled.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Alice band in plastic with plastic antlers on top.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and welt side pockets. Partly lined in faux shearling.
Long coat in felted wool containing some cashmere. Narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Short dress in softly draping viscose jersey with a boat neck, short cap sleeves and a smocked seam below the bust.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cocoon-shaped blouse in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the back and long balloon sleeves.
Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, patterned, softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, vertical seam down the front and back, and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the top, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves with a tab and button and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Polo shirt in jacquard-patterned premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned, crinkled weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and high slits at the hems.
Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt in imitation suede at the waist. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Scarf in a soft rib knit with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 30x198 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and roll edges at the neckline and opening.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips with a small frill trim and a flared skirt.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with ribbed shafts and elasticated tops.
Fleece cardigan with a ribbed shawl collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Satin-covered Alice band with faux fur pompoms at the top.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.

Long chiffon dress with a lace bodice, wide neckline and short cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band that ties at the back and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with flutter sleeves and slits in the sides.
Vest top in organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Regular fit.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Dress in airy chiffon with elastication around the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (6.5-10.5) and one pair in a child size.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and slits at the hem.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a fleece-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and fleece-lined flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and an adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Round hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Fine-knit printed jumper with long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Checked twill jacket with notch lapels, buttons down the front and front pockets. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide trousers in soft, gently draping silk with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a straight-cut back with a slit.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch wool weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Oversized denim jacket with beading, a collar, and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and hard-worn details. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, gathers at the front and elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders. Long, slightly wider sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a flared peplum. Lined at the front.

Parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, mesh-lined hood with an elasticated edge and press-studs. Small stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Pea coat in woven fabric with shiny metal buttons, notch lapels and jetted side pockets. Lined.
Cap in a cotton weave with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One pair with a frill trim at the top and one pair with an all-over print.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in slub cotton jersey with a print motif.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt.
Set containing a pair of cufflinks and a tie pin in brushed metal. Size of cufflinks 1.7x1.7 cm, length of tie pin 6 cm.

Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and fastening with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Trenchcoat in woven fabric with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
